name: Twentytwelve-sass
tagline: WordPress twentytwelve child theme using sass
body:
### Twentytwelve WordPress Child Theme using SASS
## Simple Twentytwelve WordPress child theme using SASS

Based on the demo code used for the WordPress NYC Meetup Presentation on 3/18/2014:


[Better WordPress Style: Using SASS and LESS CSS Preprocessors](http://www.meetup.com/WordPressNYC/events/169583212/)


### Authors and Contributors
It's just me (Gabriela Levit) for now: @gmlevit. Hope others contribute too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
